#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	string s;
	char ch,most,p;
	int c;
	//scanf("%s",&s);
	//printf("%s\n",s);
	cin>>s;
	//cout<<s<<endl;
	int m=0;
	int l=s.size();
	p=s[0];c=1;
	for(int i=1;i<l;i++)
	{
		if(s[i]==p)
		{
			c++;
		}
		else 
		{
			if(c>m){m=c;most=p;}
			else if(c==m){
				if(int(p)<int(most)){most=p;}
			}
			p=s[i];c=1;
		}
	}
			if(c>m){m=c;most=p;}
			else if(c==m){
				if(int(p)<int(most)){most=p;}
			}
	
	printf("%c\n%d",most,m);
	
	
	
	
	
	
	
}
